entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early this evening then clearing. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming south 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. A few flurries beginning in the afternoon. Local blowing snow. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 29 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 29 in the evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023
